title: Glacier Bay National Park & Preserve: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   Nature               Glacier Bay Research               History and Culture               For Kids               Alaska Geographic Bookstore             Glacier Bay is an amazing place. Browse this section to learn more about YOUR national park.      News Browse press releases, subscribe to updates, and discover archived news. Photos, Videos, and more... Glacier Bay is as close as your screen. Check out our photo galleries, ranger videos, park films, and more. Nature A newly exposed landscape. Wild, spectacular, and intact. Explore the natural world of Glacier Bay. Science and Research Glacier Bay is a park for science. Discover Glacier Bays rich legacy of science and learn about many research projects currently underway. History and Culture Glacier Bay abounds with rich history of Tlingit homeland, early explorers, and scientific discovery. For Kids Kids love Glacier Bay! YOU can become a Glacier Bay Junior Ranger! For Teachers Share Glacier Bay with your class! Lesson plans, activities, demos, and distance learning opportunities! Park Management Learn more about how we are managing this park to provide for visitor enjoyment while ensuring Glacier Bay resources are left unimpaired for future generations. You can also find the park's laws and policies here.
